title: 常用图像坐标系变换
content:
$$
\begin{aligned}
& Z_c\left[\begin{array}{l}
u \
v \
1
\end{array}\right]=\left[\begin{array}{cccc}
f_x & 0 & c_x & 0 \
0 & f_y & c_y & 0 \
0 & 0 & 1 & 0
\end{array}\right] \cdot\left[\begin{array}{c}
X_c \
Y_c \
Z_c \
1
\end{array}\right]=\left[\begin{array}{c}
f_x X_c+c_x Z_c \
f_y Y_c+c_y Z_c \
Z_c
\end{array}\right] \
& {\left[\begin{array}{c}
u \
v \
1
\end{array}\right]=\left[\begin{array}{cccc}
f_x & 0 & c_x & 0 \
0 & f_y & c_y & 0 \
0 & 0 & 1 & 0
\end{array}\right] \cdot\left[\begin{array}{c}
X_c \
Y_c \
Z_c \
1
\end{array}\right]=\left[\begin{array}{c}
f_x X_c / Z_c+c_x \
f_y Y_c / Z_c+c_y \
1
\end{array}\right]}
\end{aligned}
